name: Quick Base Attack
description: Allows the Base Attack action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Your default combat action, available to everyone. It can be used to apply Damage or a Basic Condition.

name: Quick Dodge
description: Allows the Dodge action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Add your Tier to your Avoidance score until the start of your next turn. This action does not stack with itself.

name: Quick Brace
description: Allows the Brace action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Add your Tier to your Durability score until the start of your next turn. This action does not stack with itself.

name: Quick Fortify
description: Allows the Fortify action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Add your Tier to all of your Resistances (Resolve, Stability, Vitality) until the start of your next turn. This action does not stack with itself.

name: Quick Aim
description: Allows the Aim action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Add your Tier to your next Accuracy Check before the end of your next turn. This action does not stack with itself.

name: Quick Empower
description: Allows the Empower action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Add your Tier to your next Damage Roll before the end of your next turn. This action does not stack with itself.

name: Quick Refine
description: Allows the Refine action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Add your Tier to your next Condition Check before the end of your next turn. This action does not stack with itself.

name: Quick Assist
description: Allows the Assist action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: An adjacent ally can add your Tier bonus to their next Accuracy Check, Damage Roll, or Condition Check before the end of their next turn.

name: Enhanced Assist
description: Range increased to 15 spaces and you can target multiple allies up to your Communication or Intelligence score.
baseActionDescription: An adjacent ally can add your Tier bonus to their next Accuracy Check, Damage Roll, or Condition Check before the end of their next turn.

name: Quick Carry
description: Allows the Carry action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Pick up and move willing characters or objects with you during your movement. If the target's total weight is greater than your Capacity score, you must succeed a Power check and can only move at half speed.

name: Effortless Carry
description: No movement speed penalty. Once you've taken this action once on a turn, you can continue to reuse it for free until the end of this turn.
baseActionDescription: Pick up and move willing characters or objects with you during your movement. If the target's total weight is greater than your Capacity score, you must succeed a Power check and can only move at half speed.

name: Quick Protect
description: Allows the Protect action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: As a reaction, you can make the next non-direct attack that would hit an adjacent ally hit you instead.

name: Guardian
description: You can protect all adjacent allies simultaneously and gain extra reactions equal to half your Tier (rounded up) to use only for the Protect Action.
baseActionDescription: As a reaction, you can make the next non-direct attack that would hit an adjacent ally hit you instead.

name: Quick Use
description: Allows the Use action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Interact with complex environmental objects like cars, computers, or heavy machinery.

name: Quick Hasten
description: Allows the Hasten action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: You can move up to your full Movement Speed again.

name: Quick Hide
description: Allows the Hide action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Conceal your presence with a Stealth Check vs. a searcher's Perception while outside their direct perception. Attacking while hidden grants bonuses.

name: Quick Prepare
description: Allows the Prepare action to be used as a Quick Action instead of a Primary Action.
baseActionDescription: Delay your action until a specified trigger occurs. The GM determines if the specified scenario is specific enough.
